name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with parmesan cheese.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture off the heat.
Serve with black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Cook chicken in a pan until browned.
Add coconut milk and simmer.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing.
Toss gently and serve.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer.
Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.
Serve with salsa.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add ginger and garlic, sauté.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry.
Add soy sauce and cook until tender.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, milk, egg, and baking powder.
Pour batter onto a hot skillet.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugar together.
Add egg and mix, then stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in a pot.
Add canned tomatoes and broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend until smooth and garnish with basil.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
Brown beef and remove from pan.
Sauté onions and mushrooms, then return beef to pan.
Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

name: Quiche Lorraine
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs and cream together.
Add cooked bacon and cheese to the mixture.
Pour into pie crust and bake for 30-35 minutes.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix quinoa, beans, corn, and cheese.
Stuff mixture into halved bell peppers and bake for 25 minutes.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomato, and onion.
Combine in a bowl with feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss gently.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and set aside.
Sauté shrimp in a pan until pink.
Add peas and carrots, then rice.
Stir in soy sauce and serve.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Layer noodles, ricotta, meat sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Top with parmesan cheese and bake for 45 minutes.

name: Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Sauté onion in a pot.
Add pumpkin and broth, simmer until soft.
Blend until smooth and stir in cream and nutmeg.

name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and set aside.
Scramble eggs in a pan.
Add rice, peas, and soy sauce.
Stir in green onions and serve.

name: Crispy Baked Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix bread crumbs, parmesan, and spices.
Coat chicken with olive oil and then with the breadcrumb mixture.
Bake for 35-40 minutes.

name: Cheese Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk and salt.
Melt butter in a pan.
Pour in eggs and cook until set.
Add cheese and fold the omelette.

name: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Preheat grill to medium heat.
Season ribs with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Cook ribs on the grill, basting with BBQ sauce.
Grill until tender.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Bring broth to a boil.
Add vegetables and pasta, cook until tender.
Stir in canned tomatoes and beans.
Simmer and serve.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and add cream.
Stir in parmesan until melted.
Combine with fettuccine and serve.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook ziti pasta and mix with marinara and ricotta.
Layer in a baking dish, top with mozzarella and parmesan.
Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season fish with taco seasoning and cook.
Fill taco shells with fish and top with cabbage.
Serve with lime wedges.

name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Mix with pesto sauce and olive oil.
Top with parmesan and pine nuts.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve chilled.

name: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Brown ground beef and onion in a pot.
Add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder.
Simmer for 30 minutes and serve.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes.
Layer with basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

name: Beef Wellington
instructions: Sear beef and let cool.
Mince mushrooms and cook.
Wrap beef in ham and mushrooms, then in puff pastry.
Brush with egg and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 25-30 minutes.

name: Coconut Curry
instructions: Heat curry paste in a pot.
Add coconut milk and mixed vegetables.
Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Serve with rice.

name: Garlic Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix butter, minced garlic, parsley, and salt.
Spread on sliced baguette and bake for 10-15 minutes.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
instructions: Cook rice and let it cool.
Mix coconut milk, sugar, and salt.
Serve rice with mango slices and drizzle coconut sauce.

name: Ratatouille
instructions: Chop vegetables and sauté in olive oil.
Add herbs and cook until tender.
Serve warm.

name: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Stir-fry beef until browned.
Add broccoli, ginger, and garlic.
Pour in soy sauce and cook until broccoli is tender.

name: Pineapple Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and set aside.
Sauté peas and carrots.
Add rice and pineapple, then stir in soy sauce.

name: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and let cool.
Whip cream and fold into chocolate.
Beat eggs and sugar, then fold in.
Chill before serving.
